title: Sequence entropy for amenable group actions. (arXiv:2210.16044v2 [math.DS] UPDATED)
description: We study the sequence entropy for amenable group actions and investigate systematically spectrum and several mixing concepts via sequence entropy both in measure-theoretic dynamical systems and topological dynamical systems. Moreover, we use sequence entropy pairs to characterize weakly mixing and null systems.
dc:creator: Chunlin Liu, Kesong Yan
